root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimum Operating System: Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 2.8 Ghz / Athlon XP 2800 RAM Memory: 1 GB HDD Space: 6 GB available Video Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 256MB Video Card Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 16-bitDisc Drive: 16X CD/DVD Drive
